deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title Destructible
 @dev Base contract that can be destroyed by owner. All funds in contract will be sent to the owner.
@dev Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.

@title Destructible
 @dev Base contract that can be destroyed by owner. All funds in contract will be sent to the owner.
@dev Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.

devdoc.details: Base contract that can be destroyed by owner. All funds in contract will be sent to the owner.

destroy().details: Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: Destructible
